Data Fields
core_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Core Microcontroller Access

Core IO Attributes. More...

#include <core.h>

Collaboration diagram for core_attr_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines the attributes structure for configuring the Core port.

Data Fields

uint32_t serial_number [4]
 The serial number of the device (from the silicon)
 
uint32_t clock
 The current clock speed.
 
uint32_t signature
 The software signature.
 
uint8_t reset_type
 The source of the last reset.
